fees.description:
Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
For more information on these fees and other fees, please visit energylocals.com.au/fees
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

We accept Visa, Mastercard and AMEX payments via energylocals.com.au/pay-by-card. Debit card transactions are subject to a 0.46% fee, and credit card payments incur a 0.81% fee. Credit and debit card processing fees are waived for Direct Debit payments.

electricityContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, visit indigopower.com.au, or call Indigo Power on 1800 491 739.

discounts.description: Discount amount stated is an estimate. Actual discount percentage amount will vary depending on customer's actual usage during Daytime Rebate period of October to March, 10am - 3pm daily. Credit of 25.74c/kWh - 27.09c/kWh (based on distribution zone) for electricity used during October to March, between 10am and 3pm applies to usage charges only, and excludes controlled load.

electricityContract.variation: Our energy prices may vary due to changes in the market and economic conditions. By entering into this Contract, you agree that we may vary your rates. You will be notified of any price change in writing at least 5 business days before effective date.

eligibility.information: Available to customers on a relevant network tariff with a Smart Meter.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: No lock in contracts or exit fees.
